txt.en: 'Well done, [placeholder]! I have never heard of such a creature as you describe, but I do not doubt the danger it represented.'
Danger in the Hills
The footprints continue off to the south
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
The footprints head west
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
The footprints continue west
The footprint you found lies to the west of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nHimeinior has asked you to return to the site of the footprint you found and track the beast to its lair.
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
The footprints head to the south-west
The second footprint lies to the south of the first, which was to the west of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue to track the beast to its lair.
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
The footprints lead into a cave to the north-west
The third footprint lies to the west of the second, south and west of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue tracking the beast to its lair.
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
TBD
The fourth footprint lies to the west of the third, south and west of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nYou should continue tracking the beast to its lair.
'I know not what this portends, but I fear a terrible beast lurks in the hills....'
TBD
The fifth footprint lies to the south-west of the fourth.\n\nYou should continue tracking the beast to its lair.
The creature's lair lies to the north-west of the fifth footprint, south-west of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nHimeinior bade you defeat the unknown creature.
Himeinior is at Echad Idhrenfair, north-east of the Grey King's lair.\n\nYou have defeated the creature known as the Grey King and should return to Himeinior with news of your victory.
Return to the site of the first footprint
Find the second footprint
Find the third footprint
Find the fourth footprint
Find the fifth footprint
Enter the Grey King's lair and defeat the creature
Talk to Himeinior at Echad Idhrenfair
TBD
The Ranger Himeinior was disturbed by the crushed boulder and skeleton you discovered while patrolling the Gloomglens.

'I am concerned, [placeholder], by the evidence you discovered while patrolling the Gloomglens. The crushed boulder and skeleton would be enough to cause concern, but I find the footprint particularly worrisome. The might and stature of the creature suggests a giant or some kind of troll, but the footprint you describe seems more bestial.

'There are many creatures in this world of which we have little or no knowledge, and such a creature would pose a genuine threat to the Grey Company. Therefore, I ask that you track the monster to its lair and dispose of it.

'Be wary upon your hunt, [placeholder]. I fear this beast is more cunning and subtle than its stature suggests.'
